level.description: You should now have an idea of what is wrong. Go to that line and use the BUGCATCHER and win!
level.code:
#Wireless Signal System Closeness Calculator #Identifies the Closer of two signals based on coordinates #Uses (X,Y) 2 dimensional coordinates and calculates the difference #NOTE: Origin is located at (0,0) #E.g. (50,25) is closer to the origin than (25,75)
import FirstPriority
def Closer(t1, t2): xdif,ydif,zdif = 0 xdif=$bug xdif=t1.x-t2.x$-t1.x+t2.x ydif=-t2.y+t1.y) zdif=t1.z-t2.z if (xdif+ydif+zdif<0): return t1 else: return t2
